about_the_game:
In a modern city shrouded in darkness, malevolent spirits roam freely. You will use various ancient secrets, including summoning spirits and casting spells, to engage in a life-or-death struggle against the invading evil forces!

Game Features:


- Perfect Combination of Poker and Roguelike Deckbuilding: Endless poker combinations provide players with a variety of distinct skills.
- Summon Diverse Spirits: Summon dozens of spirits with different abilities to fight for you: infinitely growing chickens, continuously strengthening buildings.
- Build Various Styles with Unmatched Excitement: A wide variety of cards and artifacts offer great freedom to build your unique and powerful combinations. The card-spirit-artifact trio forms endless combos, bringing unparalleled thrill.
- Numerous Rewarding Levels: Various maps are filled with rewarding levels, allowing you to uncover the witch's many secrets.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Cult Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Summon dozens of spirits in the poker game, play a straight flush, and slash the evil spirits!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
